text: The Toltec Empire,Palerm, A. (1997) Introducción a la teoría etnológica. Universidad Iberoamericana Toltec KingdomDurán, D. Historia de las Indias de Nueva España e islas de Tierra Firme or Altepetl TollanCe-Acatl: Revista de la cultura Anáhuac (1991) was an empire in Mexico. The empire existed through many periods of Mesoamerican chronology. The empire had influence as far away as the Yucatan Peninsula. The capital city of the empire was Tollan- Xicocotitlan.Cobean, R.H., Jimenez, G.E. & Mastache, A.G. (2016) Tula. Fondo de Cultura Economica It had many other important cities, such as TulancingoTulancingo de Bravo. Enciclopedia de los Municipios y Delegaciones de México. and Huapalcalco. ==References== Category:Former countries in North America Category:Mesoamerica Category:5th-century establishments Category:1120s disestablishments Category:Disestablishments in North America Category:Former empires
title: Toltec Empire
